body_html: If you want verbs support, you need to have installed the necessary OFED components, which would provide this header file among other things. If you don't have InfiniBand (or RoCE), then you don't need IB verbs.
body_text: If you want verbs support, you need to have installed the necessary OFED components, which would provide this header file among other things.  If you don't have InfiniBand (or RoCE), then you don't need IB verbs.
body: If you want verbs support, you need to have installed the necessary OFED components, which would provide this header file among other things.  If you don't have InfiniBand (or RoCE), then you don't need IB verbs.
